title: TheMuse.com Jobs Scraper
description: Scrapes jobs from TheMuse.com via the public API. Configure category, paging, and polite crawling options.

category.title: Job category
category.description: The Muse job category to scrape (e.g., 'Software Engineering', 'Account Management').

maxItems.title: Maximum number of jobs
maxItems.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Set to 0 to collect all available jobs.

maxPages.title: Maximum number of pages
maxPages.description: Maximum pages to paginate. Set to 0 to paginate until empty.

userAgent.title: User-Agent
userAgent.description: Optional: override the default user-agent string.

htmlFallback.title: HTML fallback
htmlFallback.description: If true, the actor will try a Cheerio-based HTML parse when the API returns no results.
